term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - atmosphere of the earth
term.title: atmosphere

item.text: The entire mass of air surrounding the earth which is composed largely of nitrogen, oxygen, water vapour, clouds (liquid or solid water), carbon dioxide, together with trace gases and aerosols.

item.title: composition of pure air (in atmospheric chemistry)
